content:
PR #12016 (by @Jovan Gerbscheid) adds a new helper tactic unfold? which allows you to click on terms in the infoview and see potential unfoldings of this subexpression. It's part of a bigger interactive tactic helping to rewrite specific supexpressions.

In general it is one of these self-replacing tactics that will not end up in final mathlib code, and I think it's a cool feature.

The PR is well-documented, has tests, and might just need a final review (and merge) by a maintainer.
